CustomField.description: When enabled, the system will display quiz result details to quiz taker post submission of the quiz.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, the system will display detailed quiz result information to the quiz taker after they have submitted the quiz. This includes information such as their score, the correct answers, and any additional feedback or explanations related to their responses. This feature provides participants with a comprehensive overview of their performance on the quiz.
CustomField.label: Dep Display Quiz Result Details
